channel.title: Aceshowbiz.com - Entertainment News
channel.description: Latest celebrity gossip, movie, tv and music news.

item.title: Celine Dion's Illness Leading to Postponement of Two Shows Not Related to Coronavirus
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The 'My Heart Will Go On' hitmaker, as explained in a statement, started to suffer from the 'symptoms of a common cold' on March 9 after completing a six-show run in the New York area.

item.title: MoneyBagg Yo's Baby Mama Fires Back at Ari Fletcher Over Apparent Copycat Accusation
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: People appear to side with Juiccybabyyy on this case as a fan implies that Ari seems to be ahead of herself by writing in an Instagram comment that 'she thinks everyone wanna be her.'

item.title: Amber Heard Accused of Physical and Mental Abuse by Former Assistant
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: In her legal documents against the 'Aquaman' actress, Kate James claims that the ex-wife of Johnny Depp 'would fly into blind rages where no-one could reason with her.'

item.title: Fetty Wap's Baby Mama Takes a Dig at His Large Brood
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Masika Kalysha throws a brutal shade at the 'Trap Queen' hitmaker when responding to a fan who suggests she give her daughter Khari Barbie Maxwell a sibling.

item.title: Trump on Why He Refuses to Be Tested for Coronavirus: It's No Big Deal
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The president claims he feels 'extremely good' and shows 'no symptoms' after having direct contact with two members of Congress who were exposed to coronavirus.

item.title: Lady GaGa to Get Insect Named After Her Due to Similar 'Wacky Fashion Sense'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: A University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign grad student, who discovered the new insect species, compares the female bug's 'crazy horns' to the 'Stupid Love' songstress' outlandish style.

item.title: Kevin Hart Throws Playful Jab at Dwayne Johnson Over Filming of Action Scenes
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The 'Ride Along' star suggests that his 'Jumanji: The Next Level' co-star is coward, unlike him and other notorious action film stars like Tom Cruise who have dangerous stunts in their movies.

item.title: Howie Mandel Wears Hazmat Suit and Gas Mask After Poking Fun at Coronavirus Victim
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The 'America's Got Talent' judge shows up on the set of the NBC competition show with extra precautions by wearing the DIY gear, days after posting a photo of quarantined person taken into an ambulance.

item.title: NeNe Leakes Details Husband Gregg's Infidelity With Ex-Employee
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: However, despite everything, the 'Real Housewives of Atlanta' star reveals in a new interview that she doesn't force her husband, who has recovered from cancer, to be faithful.

item.title: Soulja Boy Gets Laughed at for Selling Detergent
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The 'Crank That (Soulja Boy)' rapper, who was barely seen in public over the last year, reveals he has ditched his video game console business and is now branching out with a soap company instead.

item.title: Coachella Fires Back at Elon Musk for Dissing Festival Following Postponement Announcement
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The criticism doesn't go unnoticed by the festival which quickly claps back at the Tesla founder with many dubbing its response 'the best comeback of the day.'

item.title: Justin Timberlake Spreads Positive Vibes With New Song 'Don't Slack' Ft. Anderson .Paak
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The 'Can't Stop the Feeling' hitmaker and his collaborator co-wrote and co-produced the funky song from 'TROLLS World Tour' soundtrack album with Ludwig Goransson.

item.title: Heidi Klum Is Too Ill to Continue Taping 'America's Got Talent'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: It's said that only 3 judges, Howie Mandel, Simon Cowell and new judge Sofia Vergara, that enter the stage with Heidi missing during the filming, which features a full audience.

item.title: Naomi Campbell Takes Safety to Next Level With Full Hazmat Suit Amid Coronavirus Fears
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The British model is the latest celebrity who takes preventive measure amid the worldwide health crisis, sharing photos of her rocking a hazmat suit beneath her chic camel cape while at an airport.

item.title: 'The Wendy Williams Show' to Eliminate Audience During Live Taping in Light of Coronavirus
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The TV personality announces on Instagram that while she 'values her co-hosts and their daily participation,' her talk show will not have studio audience until 'the time is right.'

item.title: Report: Woman Whom DaBaby Allegedly Slapped Plans to Sue Him
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Although the rapper has issued an apology to the fan, whom he reportedly slapped at a Tampa show, it seems like it isn't enough as a new report suggests that she's planning to take him to court.

item.title: Zac Brown Band Call Off Remaining Dates on Spring 2020 Tour Over Coronavirus
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The 'Chicken Fried' hitmakers follow the footsteps of Madonna, Queen, Green Day and BTS in postponing shows and entire tours as precaution to the spread of COVID-19.

item.title: Billie Eilish's 'Bad Guy' Outshines Lil Nas X's 'Old Town Road' as Global Single of 2019
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Frances Moore, the CEO of the International Federation of the Phonographic Industry, praises the 18-year-old hitmaker for taking the world by storm with her incredible voice and genre-defying sound.

item.title: Meghan Trainor Assures Father Is on the Road to Recovery Post Being Hit by A Car
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: When offering update on Gary's condition, the 'All About That Bass' hitmaker spills that she was away at the time of the accident and her husband Daryl Sabara was the only one available.

item.title: Kourtney Kardashian Admits She Goes to Therapy 'Once a Week' for 'the Past Three Years'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: In a new interview, the Poosh founder talks about how she deals with anxiety and teaches her children about 'respect and boundaries' as well as the importance of God in their lives.

item.title: Mark Wahlberg Favored to Take Lead Role in 'G.I. Joe' Reboot
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The 'Transformers: Age of Extinction' star has reportedly been on the top of producer Lorenzo di Bonaventura's casting list since 2009's 'G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra'.

item.title: John Krasinski Secures His First Guest-Hosting Stint on 'Saturday Night Live'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Upon learning that he will front the long-running sketch show, the actor/director of 'A Quiet Place Part II' comes forward with a confession to his mother about his childhood secret.

item.title: Meek Mill's Private Jet Searched for the Second Time in Less Than a Week: That's an Insult
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Days after the 'Tupac Back' hitmaker complained about being an alleged victim of racial profiling, he takes to Instagram to show that his plane is being searched again.

item.title: Fans Slam SXSW and Ultra Music Fest for No Refund Option Following Cancellation Due to Coronavirus
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Fans are clearly not satisfied with the policy with someone urging SXSW to update its policy on Twitter, writing, 'How was anyone suppose to predict an epidemic canceling @sxsw when buying tickets last year.'

item.title: Harvey Weinstein Wanted Jennifer Aniston Dead, According to Court Papers
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The disgraced movie mogul suggested that the 'Morning Show' star 'should be killed' over reports that he sexually assaulted her during the production of 2005's movie 'Derailed'.

item.title: J.J. Abrams Plainly Refuses to Kill C-3PO in 'Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.category: Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker
item.description: During an appearance on 'The View', Anthony Daniels gets candid about the director's reaction to his suggestion to put his iconic humanoid robot to sleep for good.

item.title: 'Suits' Actress Amanda Schull Welcomes First Son at 41
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: In the birth announcement, the Katrina Bennett depicter on the hit series says while she and husband will call their child Paterson, they are open to 'any and all nickname suggestions.'

item.title: 'Peter Rabbit 2' Follows 'No Time to Die' Lead in Postponing Release Date Over Coronavirus
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Initially scheduled for a theatrical release of March 27 across the country, 'Peter Rabbit' sequel 'The Runaway' has been pushed back for more than four months by Sony chiefs.

item.title: Brigitte Nielsen's Sons Run Out of Food Amid Coronavirus Lockdown in Italy
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: During her appearance on 'The Talk', the 'Creed II' actress talks about her children's living situation in 'the area where it's more dangerous,' saying that 'they are scared.'

item.title: 'Bachelor' Finale Part 2 Recap: Peter Weber Finally Picks His Lady Despite Tension
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The Tuesday, March 10 episode of the long-running ABC dating show picked up with the pilot on the day of the final rose ceremony following Madison's departure.

item.title: Rosario Dawson Splits With Boyfriend Cory Booker Politically
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The 'Luke Cage' alum and her Senator beau are supporting different Democratic presidential candidates after he dropped out of the race, with the actress backing Bernie Sanders and her boyfriend endorsing Joe Biden.

item.title: Rapper Maxo Kream Mourns Brother Killed in Shooting: It Doesn't 'Get Better'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The Houston hip-hop artist's 27-year-old brother Money Mado was found dead with a gunshot wound inside an apartment in the Woodland Hills suburb of Los Angeles on Monday, March 9.

item.title: Kumail Nanjiani Discloses Struggle With Body Dysmorphia After Drastic Transformation
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Although he impressed many with a new buff physique in 2019, 'The Eternals' star confesses he needs to remind himself to be easy on himself after he started to 'just see the flaws' in his body.

item.title: Sheryl Crow Bands Together With Brothers Osborne to Raise $500,000 for Nashville Tornado Relief
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The 'To Nashville, With Love' benefit concert also sees performances by Brandi Carlile, Ashley McBryde, Yola, Old Crow Medicine Show, Margo Price and The Black Keys rocker Dan Auerbach.

item.title: Chester Bennington's Widow Brings 320 Festival to Los Angeles for Change in Mental Health Culture
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Talinda Bennington-Friedman, whose Linkin Park frontman husband died of suicide in 2017, wants to further normalize mental health conversations and provide resources for those in need.

item.title: Brad Pitt and Viola Davis to Join Forces With 'Property Brothers' Stars for 'Celebrity IOU'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The new series from HGTV network will see celebrity guests working with Drew and Jonathan Scott to reward special people in their lives with surprise renovations.

item.title: Snoop Dogg Says 6ix9ine Is 'Doing the S**t Out of' Snitching
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Snoop also talks about getting late rapper Mac Miller to appear in a movie, which seemed to be 'Scary Movie 5', when he needed to fill in a role for the flick at the last minute.

item.title: Ozzy Osbourne Gets Emotional in 'Ordinary Man' Music Video
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The visuals sees the former Black Sabbath frontman looking at footage from his life that includes home videos of his family and the all-terrain vehicle accident.

item.title: Charlie Sheen Deems Rape Allegations 'Twisted and Outlandish'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Corey Feldman accused the former 'Two and a Half Men' star in a new documentary of sexually abusing a teenage Corey Haim on the set of 1986 movie 'Lucas'.

item.title: Coachella and Stagecoach Officially Pushed Back to October Amid Coronavirus Concerns
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Stressing the importance of guests, staff and community's health and safety at a time of universal uncertainty, promoters at Goldenvoice claim they will honor all purchases for the April dates.

item.title: Daniel Radcliffe Denies Suffering From Coronavirus
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Shortly after a tweet has gone viral claiming that the 'Harry Potter' star has been diagnosed with the concerning disease, his representative insists that the story is not true.

item.title: Harvey Weinstein's Brother Calls Him 'Pathological' Liar: You Belong in Hell
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: In a newly surfaced email, Bob Weinstein says his disgraced brother bullies and abuses people 'in your whole life and now you say crap like everyone makes mistakes.'

item.title: Doja Cat Has Had Enough of People Slamming Her for Looking White
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The 'Say So' hitmaker lands in hot water after her photo for YouTube Music playlist is made public, with a lot of people pointing out that she looks so white in the image.

item.title: Report: Mel B’s Ex-Husband Forced Daughter to Keep Affair With Nanny a Secret
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The Spice Girls member allegedly claims in a new legal paper that Stephen Belafonte told Madison to refer to Lorraine Gilles as 'Jenny' to keep their romance a secret.

item.title: Scarlett Byrne Grateful to Be Expecting First Child With Hugh Hefner's Son
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The 'Vampire Diaries' star takes to her Instagram account to debut her baby bump, revealing that the couple's hearts are 'filled with gratitude and joy' due to their unborn child.

item.title: Jenna Dewan Announces Birth of Baby Boy
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Taking to her Instagram account, the 'World of Dance' host reveals that she and fiance Steve Kazee have welcomed a baby boy named Callum Michael Rebel Kazee.

item.title: KJ Apa Still Going Through Hard Times Due to Luke Perry’s Death
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The 'Riverdale' actor admits in an interview to still finding it hard to go on the set of the show and confesses that he misses talking to his late on-screen father.

item.title: Playboy Aims to Be 'More Inclusive' by Ending Playmate of the Year Title
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Instead, a representative for the magazine says that it will be replaced by Playmates of the Year which will celebrate all 'twelve diverse Playmates of the Month.'

item.title: Niecy Nash’s Divorce From Jay Tucker Finalized
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The comedienne and Jay have reportedly reached a property settlement, which states that she will get their shared home and her production company among others.

item.title: Kaley Cuoco Denies Helping Sister Briana Get a Role on 'Flight Attendant'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: 'The Big Bang Theory' alum insists that her sister landed the role with her own effort, pointing out that about 20 people loved her performance during the audition.

item.title: Jeffree Star Says NBA Players Slid Into His DMs - Who?
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The beauty influencer makes the shocking revelation when hitting back at a social media user who says, 'Jeffree Star is 6'1?? Bro was playing with the wrong balls.'

item.title: Katy Perry Gets Avoided by Her Parents Because of This
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: However, the 'Never Worn White' songstress doesn't seem to be bothered by her parents' action when talking about the matter during a radio interview in Australia.

item.title: Adrienne Bailon Slammed for Admitting She Doesn't Wash Hands After Using Bathroom
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: In the latest episode of 'The Real', the 36-year-old star gets into an argument with her co-hosts who urge her to wash her hands after using the bathroom at her home.

item.title: Billie Eilish Strips Off During Tour to Hit Back at Body-Shamers
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: In an interlude between songs, audience members are shown a clip of the Grammy-winning singer slowly removing her shirt to eventually stand in just her bra.

item.title: Wendy Williams on Nicki Minaj's Marriage to Kenneth Petty: 'You've Ruined Everything'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: In the latest episode of her self-titled talk show, the 55-year-old personality doesn't hold back at all as she tells the rap star, 'You never stand a chance when you're with a man who pulls a knife at rape point.'

item.title: Harvey Weinstein's Lawyers Seek 5-Year Sentence Citing Ill Health
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The disgraced producer's legal team is pleading with the judge to give him a mandatory minimum of five years behind bars due to fear that he'll die in prison.

item.title: Amanda Bynes and Fiance Back On Shortly After Split
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The 33-year-old actress makes use of her Instagram account to share a new selfie with Paul Michael, confirming that they have given their failed relationship another chance.

item.title: Coachella Festival to be Rescheduled Due to Coronavirus Outbreak
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.category: Rage Against the Machine;Frank Ocean;Travis Scott
item.description: The annual music and arts festival, which will feature Rage Against the Machine, Frank Ocean and Travis Scott among others this year, is initially set to be held over two weekends in April.

item.title: 'AHS' Alum Harry Hains' Cause of Death Revealed
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Before his cause of death was revealed by Los Angeles County Medical Examiner-Coroner, his mother Jane Badler revealed he 'struggled with mental illness and addiction.'

item.title: Tracy Letts Spills How He Joined Wife Carrie Coon in 'Ghostbusters: Afterlife'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com

item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Taking to her social media account, the reality TV star shares a snap of herself with the women whom she helped get out of jail in front of the White House.

item.title: Jordyn Woods Sparks Dating Rumors With Married French Singer Dadju
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The 28-year-old soul singer shares a video of the social media influencer during their trip to Dubai, United Arab Emirates and spoils her with some romantic gestures.

item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: In new documentary, Corey Feldman claims that his late Canadian friend was sexually abused by the 'Two and a Half Men' alum in between two trailers back in the 1980s.

item.title: DaBaby Snaps at Fan Trying to Take His Picture During Shopping Run
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The 'Suge' rapper, who recently made headlines for slapping a female fan at concert, is caught on camera getting irritated and almost getting physical with a man who insists on getting the star's picture.

item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com

item.description: The Lieutenant Connix depicter in the latest 'Star Wars' movie reminisces the time she helped director J.J. Abrams and his team complete the sequences involving her late mother's iconic character.

item.title: Alexis Skyy Gets Candid About Being 'Sold' at 15 in New 'LHH: Atlanta' Season 9 Trailer
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: In addition, the new season will see the TV star having a physical altercation with fellow 'LHH: Atlanta' cast member Karlie as she appears to be secretly married to someone whom Alexis is dating.

item.title: Ellie Goulding Goes Completely Naked as She Raves Over Married Life With Husband Caspar Jopling
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Aside from posing for the celebration of 10th anniversary of her first album 'Lights', the 'Love Me Like You Do' hitmaker also opens up about being a 'total mess' before marrying her art dealer husband.

item.title: Joanna Krupa Already Back in Her 'Pre-Pregnancy Bikini' 4 Months After Giving Birth
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The American-Polish model, who just gives birth to her daughter in last November, brags about being close to getting her pre-pregnancy body back after '5 weeks of some major struggles' and 'intense workouts.'

item.title: Kobe Bryant's Widow Vanessa Posts About Smiling Though Her 'Heart Is Aching'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The mother of four quotes lyrics of Nat King Cole's song 'Smile' while sharing a photo of her and her three daughters posing in front of Kobe and Gigi's mural.

item.title: Meek Mill Slammed for Pulling Out of Massachusetts Concert Due to Small Crowd
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The 'Tupac Back' rapper allegedly leaves audiences at the University of Massachusetts Mullen Center hanging as he refuses to perform because there are less than 2,000 people in attendance.

item.title: 'Jeopardy!' and 'Wheel of Fortune' Decide to Tape Without Audience Due to Coronavirus Outbreak
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: It is further said that the production team of each show makes the decision considering that most of the audience members of both 'Jeopardy!' and 'Wheel of Fortune' are people in their 60s.

item.title: Katy Perry Mourns Grandmother's Death in Poignant Tribute Days After Announcing Pregnancy
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The 'Never Worn White' singer shares a video of her telling her ailing grandma Ann Pearl Hudson about her pregnancy before Ann's passing, writing in the caption that she's got a lot of her good traits from her.

item.title: Richard Marx 'Super Bummed' Having to Delay Sold-Out European Tour Over Coronavirus
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: In a candid video message posted on his Instagram page, the 'Right Here Waiting' singer explains that he and his team did not make the decision to reschedule lightly.

item.title: Sonequa Martin-Green to Become Mother of Two

item.description: Pregnant with her second child, the 'Star Trek: Discovery' actress announces that she and her husband Kenric Green are expecting a baby girl to add to their family.

item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The 'Begin Again' actress reveals in a new interview that she's satisfied with how her 4-year-old daughter views the ending of the Disney animated version of the story.

item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The 'Modern Family' star recalls how his two daughters Claire and Sophia, who complain about their long ride to his favorite Italian restaurant, are left starstruck after being introduced to the 'Once Upon a Time in Hollywood' actor.

item.title: Eminem Gets High and Punched by Mike Tyson in 'Godzilla' Music Video
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The trippy clip, which sees the 'Lose Yourself' hitmaker having a series of bizarre hallucinations, also features Dr. Dre and a tribute to late rapper Juice WRLD.

item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The 'Keeping Up with the Kardashians' star allegedly faked reports about Kylie Cosmetics' profits before selling it to Coty, Inc., which now owns 51% stake in the company.

item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: This arrives after he was rumored to be dating Jennifer Williams, whom Rick's ex-girlfriend Briteady accused of breaking the girl code as they used to be close friends.

item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: During an appearance on 'Loose Women', the former N-Dubz member claims she wants to raise awareness on her neurological condition because of the online trolling she has received.

item.description: Two years after tying the knot with her husband, the former star of 'The Big Bang Theory' reveals that the construction on their Los Angeles house has been completed.

item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Expecting a sibling for her daughter Hayden, the 'Grey's Anatomy' actress blames her current condition for her being away a lot from social media in the past few months.

item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Having stepped away from music due to Parkinson's disease, the 'Sweet Caroline' hitmaker performs a number of his greatest hits at the Keep Memory Alive Power of Love gala in Las Vegas.

item.title: Led Zeppelin Acquitted of Copyright Infringement in 'Stairway to Heaven' Case
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Michael Skidmore has been seeking royalties from Jimmy Page and Robert Plant since 2014, accusing them of infringing Spirit's 'Taurus' to create their rock anthem.

item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The 13-year-old girl is seen walking with crutches while heading to the movies with her sister Zahara and their mother after recently undergoing a hip surgery.

item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The series of messages shared between the 'Pirates of the Caribbean' star and Christian Carino are reportedly dated back to weeks after his split from ex-wife Amber Heard.

item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Yung Miami's bandmate has been transferred to a halfway house following her release from jail in October 2019 after serving 16 months behind bars for credit card fraud.

item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.category: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
item.description: While she denies involvement in 'Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness', the former Bond girl can't help but admire the Marvel franchise for 'the humor in them.'

item.title: Pras Michel Arrested for Failing to Prove He Has Made Child Support Payment
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The former Fugees rapper has been locked in a legal battle with his ex, Angela Severiano, for months after he was accused of owing her more than $125,000 in unpaid fees for their nine-year-old son.

item.title: Jessica Simpson Says 'Newlyweds' Was Her Father's Idea

item.description: During an interview on 'On Air! with Ryan Seacrest', the 'With You' hitmaker also says that she doesn't regret doing the reality show with her ex-husband Nick Lachey.

item.title: Angelina Jolie Proud of Daughters for Putting Each Other First After Two Underwent Surgery
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com

item.title: Dylan Sprouse Pokes Fun at His Throwback Photo After Selena Gomez's Worst Kiss Revelation
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Dylan's twin brother and Selena's childhood crush Cole Sprouse has also reacted to the actress' comments, bragging that he has 'never had a girl say this' about him.

item.title: Pop Smoke's Brother Left Fuming Over Open Casket Photos From Late Rapper's Funeral

item.description: In an Instagram Stories post, Mike Dee questions a fan's morals for sneakily taking pictures of the 'Dior' hitmaker's lifeless body while attending his memorial service.

item.title: Steven Spielberg's Daughter Celebrates Sobriety After Domestic Violence Arrest
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Just one week after being arrested for a domestic violence incident against fiance Chuck Pankow, 23-year-old Mikaela asks her followers to send her 'good loving energy'.

item.title: Kourtney Kardashian Unapologetic for Kissing Her Kids on Lips: 'No One Knows My Kids Better Than Me'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: That's not the only thing that the 'Keeping Up with the Kardashians' star is dragged for as the brunette beauty was previously slammed for letting her youngest son Reign have long hair.

item.title: Boosie Badazz Desperately Sells Himself to Rihanna Despite A$AP Rocky Dating Rumors
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Telling the 'Umbrella' songstress that he's 'not going to hate on you with another [guy],' the 'Show Da World' hitmaker still begs the Barbadian beauty to look at him because he's 'a catch.'

item.title: Tekashi69 to Be Free Man Again in August
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The 'Gotti' rapper, who was sentenced to 24 months behind bars in federal racketeering case, is set to be released from prison later this year, but not before his 24th birthday in May.

item.title: 'Bachelor' Finale 1 Recap: Peter Weber Breaks Up With [SPOILER]
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: In the first part of 'The Bachelor' season 24 finale, Peter asks his family in Australia to help him make decision which one to chose between the two remaining ladies, Hannah Ann or Madison.

item.title: Brad Pitt Chose Daughter Over BAFTAs After Her Surgery
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The 'Once Upon a Time in Hollywood' actor, who canceled his trip to London last month due to a 'family obligation,' is revealed to have been with his daughter who recovered from an operation at the time.

item.title: Terrence Howard Accuses FOX of Failing to Pay His 'Empire' Fees
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The Lucious Lyon depicter launches his breach of contract lawsuit days after the network filed a separate suit against him and his company for entangling it in his legal battle with ex-wife.

item.title: 'Parasite' Makes History by Becoming U.K.'s Highest-Grossing Foreign-Language Film
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Banking $14.59 million since it opened on February 7, the Bong Joon Ho-directed movie breaks the box office record set by Mel Gibson's 'The Passion of the Christ' in 2004.

item.title: Mia Farrow and Seth Meyers Among Stars Paying Tribute to Late Max Von Sydow
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Catherine Brelet, the wife of the 'Seventh Seal' star, confirms that the two-time Oscar-nominated actor has passed away on Sunday, March 8 at the age of 90.

item.title: Future's Baby Mama Fuels Reports of His Secret Marriage to Lori Harvey
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: According to Eliza Reign who is currently battling the rapper in paternity case, they pair have tied the knot months ago in a hush-hush ceremony in Jamaica.

item.title: Loni Love Reveals She Made Her Boyfriend Sign NDA Early in Their Relationship
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The revelation earns her mixed responses as one person praises the 'Real' co-host for her straightforwardness, while some others think that this only proves her being a 'shady' person.

item.title: Daniel Craig Gets Candid About Why He Came Close to Quitting Bond After Filming 'Spectre'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Set to return as the 007 agent for one final time in 'No Time to Die', the 'Knives Out' actor opens up in a new interview why it took five years for him to go through the whole thing again.

item.title: Madonna Forced to Axe Two Madame X Dates in Paris Over Coronavirus Lockdown
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The spread of COVID-19 has also affected a number of events in the U.S. with the cancellation of the SXSW Festival in Austin, Texas as well as Ultra Music Festival in Miami.

item.title: Taylor Swift Tops Google's 2020 List of Most-Searched Woman in Music
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Serena Williams has been uncovered to be the search engine's most-searched for female athlete, while Awkwafina is revealed as the most-searched woman in comedy.

item.title: Nicki Minaj's Husband Registers Himself as Sex Offender in California After Arrest
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Kenneth Petty, who was convicted of first-degree attempted rape in New York back in 1995, has pleaded not guilty to the federal crime, but turned himself in to authorities on March 4.

item.title: Amanda Bynes Fails to Check Into Psychiatric Facility Despite Judge Order
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The troubled 'Hairspray' actress, who has been struggling with mental health issues for years, has recently ended her three-week engagement to fiance Paul Michael.

item.title: Shania Twain Thinks Her New Voice 'Kind of Sexy'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: During an interview on 'Today', the 'That Don't Impress Me Much' hitmaker admits that she will never have her old sound back after a combination of Lyme disease and stress robbed her of her voice.

item.title: Evangeline Lilly Gets Candid About Feeling 'Alone and Unseen'
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Confessing that she has gone through 'such a rough year' in 2019, the former 'Lost' actress assures fans that she is 'coming out of that deep place' though she still feels 'disconnected' from them.

item.title: Dougray Scott Claims Tom Cruise Cost Him Chance to Star as Wolverine
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Revealing how he lost the mutant part to Hugh Jackman, the 'Mission: Impossible 2' actor spills that his 'very powerful' co-star insisted that he had to stay and finish filming their action film.

item.title: Katy Perry on Becoming First-Time Mother: I'm Terrified!
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: In a clip from the March 8 episode of 'American Idol', the 'Roar' hitmaker asks her fellow judges, Lionel Richie and Luke Bryan, whether they will throw her a baby shower.

item.title: Drake Mocked for Having a Breakdown Over Jolly Rancher
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The 'In My Feelings' rapper opens up about having a hard time on the last few days which reaches the last straw when he drops one and the only remaining cherry jolly rancher from the pack.

item.title: Taraji P. Henson Confesses Wedding Planning Has Taken Its Toll on Her
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Speaking at American Express' #ExpressThanks Pop Up Cafe at Grand Central Station in New York, the 'Empire' actress admits that 'trying to match everything up is so crazy.'

item.title: Jay-Z Called 'Rude' for Turning Down Touchy Man While Attending Lakers Game With Daughter Blue Ivy
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: That aside, Hov seems to be enjoying his outing with his daughter, who looks stylish in an all-black ensemble that includes combat boots, black tee and black leggings.

item.title: Jennifer Lopez and Alex Rodriguez Do Hilarious Cross-Dressing in Flip the Switch Challenge Video
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: Taking in the latest viral challenge, the 'Hustlers' star and the Fox Sports 1 broadcaster switch clothes while dancing to Drake's 'Nonstop' in the TikTok video.

item.title: Jessa Duggar Captures Daughter's Milestone in Instagram Video
item.dc:creator: AceShowbiz.com
item.description: The 'Counting On' star shares an adorable video of her baby girl Ivy Jane saying one of her first words as she plays with a plastic baby doll that she's just got.
